originalText.text:
I came to Evan desperate to become respectable quickly ahead of a critical business outing. He was able to immediately show me a handful of significant errors in my swing and gave me the tools to diagnose most issues on the fly. With Evan’s help in a few weeks I was able to dramatically improve my score, play with confidence at some of the hardest courses,  and keep up the pace even with excellent golfers with decades of experience.

Thanks to Evan this has blossomed into a full blown golf addiction, a great hobby I can enjoy with friends and clients and he’s great at helping me reset with simple, clear and easy to implement corrections whenever bad habits start sneaking back in. He’s really helped make golf a lot of fun for me. Highly recommend working with Evan!

originalText.text: Evan was a great instructor patient and insightful. I took three lessons and improved my iron game. Golf is such a tough sport, we all need a little help. I recommend him as an instructor and follow him on social media as he has tips

text.text: Evan was a great instructor patient and insightful. I took three lessons and improved my iron game. Golf is such a tough sport, we all need a little help. I recommend him as an instructor and follow him on social media as he has tips

originalText.text: When I went to Evan I had never had a lesson in my life.   I was playing but my swing was not even close to a golf swing.   Evan was able to break down my swing piece by piece and it has changed my game to a new level.   His lessons are great , approach awesome and enjoyable.   I promise you, you will not be disappointed and your golf game will be on point !!!!  Run don’t walk

Evan was able to break down my swing piece by piece and it has changed my game to a new level.   His lessons are great , approach awesome and enjoyable.   I promise you, you will not be disappointed and your golf game will be on point !!!!  Run don’t walk

originalText.text: Evan is a great instructor and truly knows what he is doing. He is always enthusiastic and patient when fixing swing issues. He has helped me a ton with my game in a short time. If you have the opportunity to take a lesson with Evan I would definitely recommend doing so.

text.text: Evan is a great instructor and truly knows what he is doing. He is always enthusiastic and patient when fixing swing issues. He has helped me a ton with my game in a short time. If you have the opportunity to take a lesson with Evan I would definitely recommend doing so.

originalText.text: Evan is as knowledgeable as any instructor I have ever worked with.  Whether you are a single handicap player or beginner, Evan has the patience and experience to improve your game dramatically after only a few short lessons.  I have consistently been seeing him for almost two years now and highly recommend him to anyone looking for an instructor who can get real results and can teach the game to you in way that is fun and easy to comprehend.  He is A plus!
